lead.title: General Use Application Software
lead.text: Software used by the general public in the world currently.

menu.title: STBB Direct
menu.text: A application used extensively by property buyer, sellers and agents for handling interactions with STBB, a large coonveyancing law firm.

menu.title: Store Master
menu.text: A full retail, warehousing and point of sale system for medium to large organisations.

menu.title: ECG Apptitude
menu.text: An reference and educational tool for cardiac medical students and specialists.

menu.title: Ova To You
menu.text: A market resource tool that allow users to respond to questionaires for fun and prizes.
